TopicTitle: Looking for the name of a mod

Articles.Content:
Ok I am looking to update my mod but I deleted my folder before I wrote down what I was using. I know noob. Anyway it's the mod where you can rotate things at more angles then stock ksp. Your also able to add like 50+ of the same part on the same angle.

I can't for the life of me think of the mod.

Edited December 29, 2013 by megatarre

was it Editor Extensions?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38768

If not, there's a library post of mods here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library
